content: PX 10 Transpointer Precise transpointer to detect entry and exit points, as well as the distance between them ### Categories: Home > Products > Measuring tools & scanners > Concrete scanners and sensors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Unique slope adapter shows start or exit point of drilling at any drilling angle Position point can be transposed through floors, ceiling and walls – allowing any drilling work to be carried out quickly and efficiently User-friendly direction indicators for easy operation Measures wall thickness automatically – saving time by skipping trial-and-error pilot drilling Applications Transferring the starting point for drilling through-holes to the other side Wall and ceiling thickness measurement for easy selection of the proper drill or core bit Determine drill bit exit position and transfer drilling positions when drilling through walls and ceilings in concrete and masonry ### TECHNICAL DATA: Accuracy of depth indication: 4% Operating temperature range: -4 - 131 °F Maximum operating time: 17 h Technical Data | Accuracy of depth indication | 4% | 1 | Operating temperature range | -4 - 131 °F | Maximum operating time | 17 h | Working temperature range | -4 - 131 °F | Dimensions (receiver) | 8.3 x 3.7 x 1.3 in | Dimensions (transmitter) | 8.3 x 3.7 x 1.3 in | Weight with batteries | 1.1 lb | Performance and accuracy can be significantly affected by site conditions. See operating instructions. ### ITEMS- 273125 - Transpointer PX 10 kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PX 10 R Receiver - 1x PX 10 T Transmitter - 1x PUA 91 Adhesive putty - 2x Hand strap - 2x 9V Block Battery alkaline - 1x PXA 70 Slope adapter - 1x PUA 70 Marker pen - 1x PX 10 Tool case assy - 273123 - Transpointer PX 10 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x PX 10 R Receiver - 1x PX 10 T Transmitter - 1x PUA 91 Adhesive putty - 2x Hand strap - 2x 9V Block Battery alkaline - 1x PX 10 Tool case assy
